share on x mr michelle reisbergm. jun 14 at 8:06 pm lenny and i were blessed to call mike our friend. we will miss him so much. all our love and prayers to lorraine and his family. michelle and lenny reisberg. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 14 at 5:35 pm simply elegant spathiphyllum was purchased for the family of michael thomas briggs. share on x bp beverly pierre. jun 14 at 4:44 pm my brother and i have many wonderful memories of easter and summers spent in north carolina and delaware with michael and the rest of our cousins. sending love and prayers to all of you. love bev. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x mc mary and oscar centoni. jun 14 at 11:30 am mary and oscar centoni purchased the peaceful white lilies basket for the family of michael thomas briggs. share on x jun 14 at 10:03 am peaceful white lilies basket was purchased for the family of michael thomas briggs. share on x jb jacqueline brown. jun 13 at 8:53 pm i met michael only once but his children angela and derek were a huge part of my whole family! their mother tammy i know as well! the loss of a loved one, especially your parent is never easy. you are all in my prayers during and after this difficult time.... i love you angela and derek, god bless all of you... comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x es erica sjun 13 at 7:11 pm i didn't have the pleasure of knowing michael but, i know his daughter, angela. and if he was anything like her, he was a great man. i am so sorry to the family and friends that are grieving during this heartbreaking time. you all are and will continue to be in my thoughts and prayers. erica salber & familycomment share comment share facebook twitter share on x sam goucher. jun 13 at 5:29 pm i served with mike in the navy during the last half of the 1970's. we were parachute riggers and worked in a small shop of 4 sailors. from the minute mike reported aboard the squadron at nas cecil field, fl he made each day a little brighter. a professional who told me that his goal was to have my job as the supervisor... and he reached that goal when i transferred. always laughing and ready to pull the prank on his fellow sailors. it was my privilege to call him my friend and shipmate. there's a new angel up there. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... celebration of life services. jun 15. 3:00 pm - 4:00 pm cochran funeral home murphy4334 us 64 east alt. - po box 829. murphy, nc, us, 28906. get order flowers now for michael's celebration of life services no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook cochran family of funeral service website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
